### SMD

$$
\text{SMD}_i = \frac{\bar{\text{X}}_{2i} - \bar{\text{X}}_{1i}}{\sqrt{\frac{(n_{1i}-1)\text{SD}^2_{1i}+(n_{2i}-1)\text{SD}^2_{2i}}{n_{1i}+n_{2i}-2}}},
$$

$$
\text{Var}({\text{SMD}_i})= \frac{n_{1i}+n_{2}}{n_{1i}n_{2i}}+\frac{\mathrm{SMD}_i^2}{2(n_{1i}+n_{2i})},
$$
### lnRR 


$$
\ln{\text{RR}_i} = \ln \left({\frac{\bar{\text{X}}_{2i}}{\bar{\text{X}}_{1i}}}\right),
$$

$$
\text{Var}(\ln{\text{RR}}_i) =\frac{\text{SD}^2_{1i}} {n_{1i} \bar{\text{X}}^2_{1i}} + \frac{\text{SD}^2_{2i}} {n_{2i} \bar{\text{X}}^2_{2i}},
$$

### lnRR 

$$
Zr_i = \frac{1}{2} \ln \left({\frac{1+r_{i}}{1-r_{i}}}\right),
$$
$$
\text{Var}(Zr_i) =\frac{1}{n_i-3},
$$

### effect sample size (weight)

$$
\tilde{n}_{i} = \frac{n_{1i}n_{2i}} {n_{1i} + n_{2i}},
$$

$$
 \frac{1}{\tilde{n}_{i}} = \frac{n_{1i} + n_{2i}}{n_{1i}n_{2i}} = \frac{1}{n_{1i}} + \frac{1}{n_{2i}},
$$

## Egger


$$
z_{i} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}prec_i + e_i,
$$

$$
e_{i} \sim \mathcal{N}(0, \sigma_e^2),
$$
## Egger reformulation

$$
y_{i} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}se_i + \epsilon_i,
$$

$$
\epsilon_i \sim \mathcal{N}(0, v_i\phi),
$$
## Egger meta-regression

$$
y_{i} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}se_i + s_i + m_i,
$$
$$
u_{i} \sim \mathcal{N}(0, \sigma_s^2), m_i \sim \mathcal{N}(0, v_i),
$$

$$
\tau^2
$$

# time-lag bias

$$
y_{i} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}year_i + s_i + m_i,
$$

# Fail-safe N

$$
N_{Rosenthal} = \left( \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{N_{study}}{z_i}}{1.645} \right)^2 - N_{study}
$$
$$
N_{Orwin} = \frac{N_{study}(\bar{y} - y_n)}{y_n} \
$$

$$
N_{Rosenberg} = \frac{N_{study}W}{\sum_{i=1}^{N_{study}}{w_i}},
$$

$$
W = \left( \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{N_{study}}{w_iy_i}}{t_{0.05(N_{stduy})}} \right)^2 - \sum_{i=1}^{N_{study}}{w_i}
$$

# P value based.....


# PEESE

$$
y_{i} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}v_i + u_i + m_i,
$$
# Multilevel model

$$
y_{i} = \beta_{0}  + s_j + u_i + m_i,
$$

$$
s_{j} \sim \mathcal{N}(0, \sigma_s^2), u_{i} \sim \mathcal{N}(0, \sigma_u^2), m_i \sim \mathcal{N}(0, v_i),
$$

# Mulitlevel meta-regression

$$
y_{i} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}x_{1j} + \beta_{2}x_{2i} + s_j + u_i + m_i,
$$

$$
resid_{mi} = y_{i} - (\beta_{0} + \beta_{1}x_{1j} + \beta_{2}x_{2i}),
$$
$$
resid_{c1i} = y_{i} - (\beta_{0} + \beta_{1}x_{1j} + \beta_{2}x_{2i} + s_j),
$$

$$
resid_{c2i} = y_{i} - (\beta_{0} + \beta_{1}x_{1j} + \beta_{2}x_{2i}+ s_j + u_i),
$$

# Mulitlevel Egger
$$
y_{i} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}se_i  + s_j + u_i + m_i,
$$

$$
y_{i} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}year_i  + s_j + u_i + m_i,
$$


$$
y_{i} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}v_i  + s_j + u_i + m_i,
$$

# Mulitlevel Muskill
$$
y_{i} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}\sqrt{\frac{1}{\tilde{n}_{i}}}  + s_j + u_i + m_i,
$$

$$
y_{i} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}\left(\frac{1}{\tilde{n}_{i}}\right)  + s_j + u_i + m_i,
$$


$$
y_{i} = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}\sqrt{\frac{1}{\tilde{n}_{i}}} + \beta_{2}year_j + \beta_{3}sex_{i} + \beta_{4}noct_h + a_k + q_k + s_j + u_i + m_i,
$$


$$
s_{j} \sim \mathcal{N}(0, \sigma_a^2\textbf{A}), u_{i} \sim \mathcal{N}(0, \sigma_q^2), 
$$

se^2_i
